name: Asteroids (itch)
description:
Classic Mode Controls:

Esc - Pause

WASD - Move Controls

Mouse cursor- Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Use LMB to destroy asteroids. If an asteroid hits you, you lose a life.

Pacifist Mode Controls:

Esc - Pause

Ship follows your cursor. Just dodge the Asteroids.

Saving astronauts gives +5 points. An astronaut will spawn every 5 seconds in a random location on the screen.
